Text.Page:
My sisters found an altar in the catacombs.

Mahagi spotted it. She's hiding in the Malefic Laboratories, east of here.

The {@LinkCreature:22#23#mekonari sorcerers}, {@LinkCreature:22#24#ebon imp thralls}, and {@LinkCreature:22#25#mekonari darkweavers} stand in your way. Obliterate them and find her.

I've heard a lot about you from the others.

Your hands are covered with the blood of my sister witches, but this is a day all of us are so stained.

Let's put an end to this.
